preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 10 g of Indium, 5 g of Silicon, 5 g of Tellurium, and 60 g of Zirconium using a precision scale.
2. Combine all the weighed powders in a clean, dry ceramic crucible.
3. Mix thoroughly using a spatula to ensure a homogeneous blend of the materials.
